channel.title: PvP Power Level Explosion (uhh yeah it's new!)
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][font=verdana]PvP Power Level Explosion[/font][/size][/center]
[center]Hello, I would like to introduce a newly released, and developing server called PvP Power Level Explosion. Yes, I did have another server source, Hikscape, which has been discontinued. Anywho, back on track. [b]We aim to satisfy your RSC needs. Server will be updated as much as possible, as well with events.[/b] Here are a few pictures of the magnificent server, showing the a few of the features I have implemented.[/center]
King Black Dragon in the wilderness agility area, where you need 6 keys, and agility to reach him (yes we have agility) [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/wj6nu9.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/4h4853.png[/img]
And here is [b]agility[/b] in action [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2q8ochc.png[/img] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/1zgzujs.png[/img]
[b]Server Commands[/b] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/260wj7k.png[/img]
[b]Announcing[/b] (for the use of events and news, special thanks to Crooks!) [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/b3poi0.png[/img]
Oh wait, there's one more key feature, [b]the Legends Guild![/b] To access this magnificent guild, not everyone can get in to, you will need to complete all of our quests (basic quests in NOOBSCAPE v3 source, more quests will be added) [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/huoj8o.png[/img] [img]http://i46.tinypic.com/xb0doy.png[/img] [center][size=10pt] Well, enough with the features, come join us today![/size]
[b]Client Download: [url=http://uppit.com/v/O70REMDI]PvP Power Level Explosion v4[/url][/b] [/center] I just recently added f2p/p2p, an afk room instead of logging out every 15 minutes, and much much more!

item.title: PvP Power Level Explosion (uhh yeah it's new!)
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“Mental Piracy, post:13, topic:331767”][quote author=imthenull link=topic=428144.msg3150808#msg3150808 date=1268517396]

Wow, could you think of any longer names?
Server looks decent

yeah… uhm, “The Server Where You Just Login With Any Username And Password No Registration Required To Play, Also We Have Some Quests”, nah jk my brother came up with pvp power level explosion when i asked him what i should name my server haha
[/quote]
ATM it goes to PPLE should find some way to jam an E and an O in there somewhere PvP Extreme Ownage Power Level Explosion. That way it would be PEOPLE.

On a serious note looks decent, gj[/quote]

Lmao, thats hilarious, i didnt think of that, otherwise i would have named it that in the first place xD

Read full topic
